original: High School: Boar  Corner High  School

There is no sugar-coating this. I've made such a mess of my life. I live alone. I have no career to speak of. Ever since that psychotic bitch tampered with my brake fluid and I crashed into the mini-mart, it has been one disaster after another. What has happened to me? The years haven't been kind. Every night I sit at home eating noodles and drinking mouthwash until I pass out in my own vomit. I would kill myself but I'm too much of a coward.
translated: 不兜圈子了，我这一生已经一团糟了。独自一人活着，没有事业可谈。那个疯婆娘偷偷放光了刹车油，害得我一头撞进杂货店，坏事接连不断。我这几年经历了些什么？这些年一点都不好过。每天晚上我都坐在家里吃面条、喝漱口水，直到昏倒在自己的呕吐物里。我想自杀，但又害怕到不敢自杀。

original: Does anybody want to meet up for a drink?
translated: 有人想和我喝上一杯吗？

original: Randy! I can't believe you're on this website! You can't even begin to understand how devastated I was when you took out that restraining order against me. How many times do I have to tell you I'm sorry??? I was young, I was in love. I am a different person now. I am lots of different people. I'm at college and I even have a
translated: Randy！没想到会在这里看到你！当年你对我掏出限制令的那一刻简直是晴天霹雳。到底要道歉多少次才能原谅我？？？那时我还年轻，为了你陷入痴狂。现在的我已经不一样了，和以前大不相同了。我在大学里读书，而且还开了个

original: . I still wear a lock of your hair around my neck. Please don't shut me out again, Randy. I've started hurting animals again. I need you. Nobody will ever love you as much as me.
translated: 。脖子上至今还戴着一缕你的头发。求你不要再拒绝我了，Randy。我又开始虐待动物了。我需要你。没有人比我更加爱你。
- Amber 么么么么么么么么么么么

original: Just leave me alone. And leave my family alone. You've caused enough problems to last a lifetime. I will walk with a limp for the rest of my life because of you.
translated: 离我远点。离我的家人远点。你带来的灾难毁了我的一生，我这辈子都是一个瘸子了。

original: You dumped me on my birthday. I will kill you on yours.
translated: 你在我的生日当天甩了我，我会在你的生日当天杀了你。
